response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to you, based on our understanding of your needs and preferences. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive deal tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled quality while also making the most out of your investment. We believe this price reflects the true value and benefits of the product, and we are confident it will meet your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
